name: first_challenge
author: chanu baba
description: People keep trying to trick my players with imitation flags. I want to make sure they get the real thing! I'm going to provide the SHA-256 hash and a decrypt script to help you know that my flags are legitimate.

name: second_challenge
author: chanu baba
description: People keep trying to trick my players with imitation flags. I want to make sure they get the real thing! I'm going to provide the SHA-256 hash and a decrypt script to help you know that my flags are legitimate.

author: chanu baba

name: Mystery
author: Chanuka Isuru Samapath (RIO6IX)
description: We've recovered an image, and intelligence suggests that there might be hidden data stored within it.However, nothing is visible at first glance.Can you find the secret information?
hints: Sometimes, useful data is stored in metadata fields

name: See Stego?
author: Chanuka Isuru Samapath (RIO6IX)
description: We suspect that someone has hidden information inside image. However, without the right key, we can't access it. Can you find the hidden flag?.

name: Stego Secrets
author: Chanuka Isuru Samapath (RIO6IX)
description: This image has been tampered with in multiple ways.Can you retrieve the hidden flag?
